meanings.definition: The act of making something slimmer or more slender.
meanings.sent1: She used special exercises to help with the slimmings of her waist.
meanings.sent2: The store offered a variety of slimmings to help customers achieve their desired look.
meanings.sent3: The slimmings of the dress made her feel like a princess.
meanings.sent4: The slimmings of the tree branches in winter gave the garden a delicate appearance.
meanings.sent5: The slimmings of the pencil created precise lines in her artwork.

meanings.definition: Items or products intended to aid in weight loss.
meanings.sent1: She purchased some slimmings from the store to help with her diet.
meanings.sent2: The market was filled with various slimmings promising quick results.
meanings.sent3: Her bag was full of slimmings, making it heavy to carry around.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were stocked with slimmings, each claiming to be the best.
meanings.sent5: The commercials advertised new slimmings that were all the rage.

meanings.definition: The process of reducing body fat or losing weight.
meanings.sent1: Her doctor recommended a plan for healthy slimmings to improve her health.
meanings.sent2: She dedicated herself to daily exercise for effective slimmings.
meanings.sent3: The slimmings journey was challenging but rewarding in the end.
meanings.sent4: The slimmings program helped her achieve her weight loss goals.
meanings.sent5: She celebrated each milestone in her slimmings journey with joy.
